title: "Amazon is finally offering free drone delivery for prescriptions"
excerpt: "If you order your medications through Amazon Pharmacy, you could soon have a drone deliver them for free within 60 minutes of ordering. With this service, Amazon seeks to reduce the time window between consumers feeling sick and getting treatment."
